sentences: Olen alati tantsinud oma vanema juurde.
Ta on hästi lahke ja juba nii, et ta teab, kuidas tantsida.
context: The word 'tantsima' in Estonian translates to 'to dance'. It is commonly used when referring to the act of dancing or expressing the desire to do so. In conversational contexts, it might appear in phrases like 'I want to dance' or 'Let's go dancing', indicating an action one wishes to perform.
